column1: Little Goat Diner////I went there for the first time for lunch and tried their blue plate.  It was salmon tacos.  If you know anything about me
column2: I'd rather have savory versus sweet.  The dish had a combination of both but I wasn't going insane over the dish.  And trust me
column3: there have been moments where I've experienced a near food orgasm but not here.  It was just good.
